subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: The United States captain Paul Azinger is switching the Ryder Cup format with hopes of giving his team an edge, going back to alternate shot in the opening matches for the first time since 1999. The Ryder Cup will be played Sept. 19-21 at Valhalla Golf Club in Louisville, Ky.
